contact.name: The EarthCube GeoWS Building Block Project

info.description:
This is a collection of servcies for unfunded collaborators showing data retrieval from respective data providers.

For each service

  • use the GET operation to retrieve data and build the respective URL
  • use the HEAD operation to build a URL

license.name: Data provided under GNU Lesser General Public License

info.title: GeoWS Unfunded Collaborator's Services

get.description:
The dmsp service provides query access to the DMSP catalog service using content type of files or extents. After determining the desired data from a catalog query, a request to prepare the data for download can be made by changing the content type to data.

This web service can provide catalog data in a text format like the web application at NGDC DMSP Catalog Service

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

get.summary: Get DMSP file list, extents, or data request

head.description:
The dmsp service provides query access to the DMSP catalog service using content type of files or extents. After determining the desired data from a catalog query, a request to prepare the data for download can be made by changing the content type to data.

This web service can provide catalog data in a text format like the web application at NGDC DMSP Catalog Service

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

head.summary: Get DMSP file list, extents, or data request

parameters.description: required for data download - indicates the recipient for messages from NGDC next-web REST ordering service
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: files provides a list of files that may be retrieved with the respective query parameters. extents provides an estimate of total size for the respective query parameters. data will cause a request to be made for the respective query parameters
parameters.name: content

parameters.description: start time for desired coverage
parameters.name: starttime

parameters.description: end time for desired coverage
parameters.name: endtime

parameters.description: Case sensitive ID, e.g. F12 or F13, etc.
parameters.name: satellite

parameters.description: A point of desired coverage
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: A point of desired coverage
parameters.name: latitude

get.description: The wssversion service provides the version number of this service)

406.description: Not Acceptable - look at Accept headers, WebServiceShell only returns text/plain here

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description: The wssversion service provides the version number of this WebServiceShell (WSS))

406.description: Not Acceptable - look at Accept headers, WebServiceShell only returns text/plain here

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description:
The intermagnet service provides a list of files or magnetic data via a GeoWS style web service.

For more information about INTERMAGNET and data definition, see INTERMAGNET Data Download

The email and accept parameters are required to indicate acceptance of conditions of use.

Additionally, observatories parameter is added to enable query by one or more observatories.

When content type of data is specified, this service submits requests in batches and polls for up to 10 times on 10 second intervals.

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

head.description:
The intermagnet service provides a list of files or magnetic data via a GeoWS style web service.

For more information about INTERMAGNET and data definition, see INTERMAGNET Data Download

The email and accept parameters are required to indicate acceptance of conditions of use.

Additionally, observatories parameter is added to enable query by one or more observatories.

When content type of data is specified, this service submits requests in batches and polls for up to 10 times on 10 second intervals.

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

parameters.description: required for data download request and indication of acceptance of conditions of use
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: I accept the conditions of use and I confirm that the e-mail address I have entered is correct
parameters.name: accept

parameters.description: files - list of available files, data - text version of magnetic data
parameters.name: content

parameters.description: text - data is in GeoWS well structured text form, IAGA2002 - output is structured in INTERMAGNET format IAGA2002
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: start time for desired coverage
parameters.name: starttime

parameters.description: end time for desired coverage
parameters.name: endtime

parameters.description: Any or all of America,Asia,Europe,Pacific,Africa
parameters.name: regions

parameters.description: Any or all of NH,NM,E,SM,SH - where NH is North High Latitude, etc.
parameters.name: latitudes

parameters.description: Comma separated list, e.g. ASC,BOU,VIC  - empty list selects all.
parameters.name: observatories

parameters.description: One of variation, provisional, quasi-definitive, best (best available), additionally for minute rate - definitive
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: The interval between data entries.
parameters.name: rate

get.description: The wssversion service provides the version number of this service)

406.description: Not Acceptable - look at Accept headers, WebServiceShell only returns text/plain here

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description:
The utepgravitymag service provides gravity or magnetics data via a GeoWS style web service.

This web service provides the same data as the web application at UTEP Web Application for Gravity and Magnetic

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

head.description:
The utepgravitymag service provides gravity or magnetics data via a GeoWS style web service.

This web service provides the same data as the web application at UTEP Web Application for Gravity and Magnetic

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

parameters.description: One of text or JSON, default is text
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: One of gravity or magnetics, default is magnetics
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: western limit
parameters.name: minlongitude

parameters.description: eastern limit
parameters.name: maxlongitude

parameters.description: southern limit
parameters.name: minlatitude

parameters.description: northern limit
parameters.name: maxlatitude

get.description:
The waterleveltides service provides station names and waterlevel data via a GeoWS style web service.

This web service can provide data in a text format like the web application at NGDC Tides Data Extract

Additionally, this web service can provide metadata concerning station names and availability like the web application at NGDC Tides Station List

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

head.description:
The waterleveltides service provides station names and waterlevel data via a GeoWS style web service.

This web service can provide data in a text format like the web application at NGDC Tides Data Extract

Additionally, this web service can provide metadata concerning station names and availability like the web application at NGDC Tides Station List

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

parameters.description: overview - shows only stations, for waterlevel values, choose one of [year, month, day, hour, minute, full]
parameters.name: resolution

parameters.description: Comma separated list, e.g. 9411166, MAHU  - empty list selects any.
parameters.name: stationIDs

parameters.description: western limit
parameters.name: minlongitude

parameters.description: eastern limit
parameters.name: maxlongitude

parameters.description: southern limit
parameters.name: minlatitude

parameters.description: northern limit
parameters.name: maxlatitude

parameters.description: start time for desired coverage
parameters.name: starttime

parameters.description: end time for desired coverage
parameters.name: endtime

parameters.description: don't output records when the location is null
parameters.name: skipNullLatLong

parameters.description: show records when the location is null
parameters.name: selectNullLatLong

parameters.description: don't output records when the availability times are null
parameters.name: skipNullDatumTime

parameters.description: show records when the availability times are null
parameters.name: selectNullDatumTime

get.description:
The wovodata service provides listings of eruptions, montioring stations, etc. via a GeoWS style web service.

This web service complements the web application at See your volcano

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

get.summary: Get selected data from WOVOdat database

head.description:
The wovodata service provides listings of eruptions, montioring stations, etc. via a GeoWS style web service.

This web service complements the web application at See your volcano

400.description: Bad Request, and error messages releated to client interaction with WebServiceShell

406.description: Not Acceptable

500.description: Internal Server Error, and error messages related to handler operation or WebServiceShell configuration

head.summary: Get selected data from WOVOdat database

parameters.description: One of text, csv, or JSON, default is text
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: western limit
parameters.name: minlongitude

parameters.description: eastern limit
parameters.name: maxlongitude

parameters.description: southern limit
parameters.name: minlatitude

parameters.description: northern limit
parameters.name: maxlatitude

parameters.description: show records when either lat, long, or elevation is not a number
parameters.name: showNumberFormatExceptions

parameters.description: get a list of volcanos with respective Ids
parameters.name: getVolcanoIds

parameters.description: get a stored list of volcanos with respective Ids and locations
parameters.name: getVolcanoLocations

parameters.description: build volcanos list with Ids and locations, this list may contain newer items than getVolcanoLocations, may take 20 minutes
parameters.name: getBaseUpdate

parameters.description: enter cavw (Catalog of Active Volcanoes of the World, e.g. 1302-01-  see getVolcanoIds for all cavw values), provides name and date of eruptions for respective volcano
parameters.name: getEruptionList

parameters.description: enter cavw, provides a list of monitoring stations near respective volcano
parameters.name: getAllStationsList

parameters.description: enter cavw, provides status, owner and other metadata
parameters.name: getCcUrl

parameters.description: enter cavw, provides other volcano locations
parameters.name: getNeighborsList

parameters.description: enter cavw, provides list of time series data available near respective volcano
parameters.name: getTimeSeriesForVolcano
